TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HitTestResultCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HitTestResultCallback(result As HitTestResult) As HitTestResultBehavior
type HitTestResultCallback = delegate of HitTestResult -> HitTestResultBehavior

param.name: result
param.span: 值，表示从命中测试返回的视觉对象。

span.span: The value that represents a visual object that is returned from a hit test.

summary.span: 表示用于自定义命中测试的回叫。

span.span: Represents a callback that is used to customize hit testing.

summary.span: WPF 调用 ，向用户报告命中测试交集。

span.span: WPF invokes the to report hit test intersections to the user.

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示从命中测试中产生的操作。

span.span: A that represents the action resulting from the hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命中的测试回叫方法定义的可视化树中的特定视觉对象上标识命中的测试时执行的操作。The hit test callback method defines the actions that you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree. 执行操作后，应在回调返回值，该值确定是否要继续循环访问的可视化树的任何其他视觉对象。After you perform the actions, your callback is expected to return a value that determines whether to continue iterating through the visual tree for any other visual objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用通过使用值。The following example shows how to invoke by using a value. 此外定义相应的命中的测试回叫方法。The corresponding hit test callback method is also defined. [!code-csharp[DrawingVisualSample#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#103)] [!code-vb[DrawingVisualSample#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#103)]
